name: UICollectionViewFlowLayoutInvalidationContext
desc: A set of properties for determining whether to recompute the size of items or their position in the layout.

items.name: var invalidateFlowLayoutDelegateMetrics: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether to recompute the size of items and views in the layout.

items.name: var invalidateFlowLayoutAttributes: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether to recompute the layout attributes for items and views in the layout.
